definitions.text: the act of sharing in the activities of a group
examples: the teacher tried to increase his students' engagement in class activities

definitions.text: a connection of inclusion or containment
examples: he escaped involvement in the accident
there was additional involvement of the liver and spleen

definitions.text: a sense of concern with and curiosity about someone or something
a usually secretive or illicit sexual relationship
the condition of sharing in common with others (as fellows or partners etc.)
